doc.title: Tom Atkins Blues
doc.plot: Shot in eight days on HDV by a team of six, 'Tom Atkins Blues' is not only a funny and moving document of the late night shop but also about confronting change when it is forced upon us. An energetic mixture of documentary and fiction, made without television or arts funding, supported and sponsored by individuals and companies in Berlin who simply want to see this film made. Undiluted and unfettered.
